chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
The iPhone was supposed to be delivered today. When can I expect it? 

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

Why haven't you dispatched the customer's parcel yet?

If the order is not dispatched within the next 24 hours, we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

The customer's satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901199969

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 11th June. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
